item.title: Routing to other servers with Traefik
item.description: I recently added Immich to my homelab. To be precise: I added it to the 30 or so Docker containers that were already running on my Raspberry Pi 4 – and it finally caused my already wobbly setup to collapse. Immich comes with multiple containers, one of which is solely responsible for generating a local A.I. model to match people in photos. I tried a few ways to limit resources on the containers, but other services still kept crashing and the whole system became unresponsive.
